DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct United States America ( USA ) . This 12 month study determine Norditropin safe effective child IGF deficiency .
DOC.brief_title: Somatropin ( Norditropin ) Insulin-like Growth Factor ( IGF ) Deficient Children
DOC.criteria: Ages 315 Presence growth failure indicate height standard deviation score less equal 2 Body mass index great equal 25th percentile height age IGF concentration less equal 33rd percentile
